channel.title: Why can no one connect to my server?
channel.description: i have 'no-ip DUC' open with the tick on, i have my server on with it saying 'server connected' and i have done the paths. But only I can log on, no one else can because 2 of my friends cant when i asked them to try get onto my server (they wrote in the server that i have ticked on 'no-ip DUC'. does anyone know why because i have set up everything on my server but i cannot sort this one out!

item.title: Why can no one connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

FORWARD YOUR PORTS!!!

www.portforward.com

^Complete tuts there^ Don’t post in here agin on how to do it, or I’ll scream at you.

Read full topic
